about_the_game:
Explore an abandoned open world and build alliances with other survivors

Dead's Dawn is a survival game in which you are one of the few survivors after a mysterious disease spread throughout the world. Advance and adapt to survive in this world by forging alliances and fighting against other survivors and infected people.

Discover large areas of nature where you can hunt and hide to stay alive. If you need food or medicine, you can go to small urban centers that carry a multitude of risks.

Develop your camp and explore to upgrade your equipment.

Cooperative multiplayer and Lan
You can begin your adventure exploring the world of Dead's Dawn, facing the threat of the infected while trying to survive. If you feel like company, you can always play in multiplayer mode on public servers or create your own private server where other people can join your session. game whenever they want.

Total freedom to create game servers
We believe in total freedom when playing so that the game has a long life, therefore we put at your disposal public servers and also the option of creating servers in Lan mode without dependence on our servers so that you can continue playing at any time .

Construction and creation of items
The world in Dead's Dawn evolves and your character must do so to survive, create and build your camp by obtaining vital materials and objects to continue the progression.

Enemies
Remember that you are not alone, throughout the world you will find wild and infected animals that will not hesitate to become one of them, choose your path wisely and be careful because you could also come across a survivor who wants to kill you.

We share our progress and value your opinions
Don't hesitate and join us on Discord, we will constantly post the evolution of progress and we would love to talk to you and hear your ideas:

short_description: Deads Dawn is a multiplayer survival game, explore an unpopulated world full of threats, you will find other survivors along the way who can be your allies or enemies. Create, build and hunt to survive as long as possible. Developed with Unreal Engine 5.
